name: Riverview Bancorp, Inc.
description: Riverview Bancorp, Inc. is a community bank holding company that provides a range of banking services through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Riverview Community Bank. Founded in 1923 and headquartered in Vancouver, Washington, Riverview Bancorp serves individuals and businesses throughout the Pacific Northwest. The bank is dedicated to fostering strong relationships with its customers and the communities it serves, offering personalized banking solutions tailored to meet diverse financial needs. With a focus on residential and commercial lending, deposit services, and wealth management, Riverview Bancorp aims to enhance the lives of its customers through innovative financial products and exceptional service. The bank prides itself on its commitment to community involvement, supporting local initiatives and organizations that enhance the quality of life in the areas it serves. Riverview Bancorp also emphasizes technology and digital banking solutions, ensuring that customers have convenient access to their accounts and services. Through a strategic growth approach, Riverview Bancorp continues to expand its footprint while maintaining a strong focus on risk management and customer satisfaction. The company’s mission is to be the bank of choice in the communities it serves by delivering superior financial services and community-oriented values.
